verse: चित्तमेव हि संसारस्तत्प्रयत्नेन शोधयेत्। यच्चित्तस्तन्मयो भाति गुह्यमेतत्सनातनम् ॥

terms.संसारः: the world, the cycle of birth and death

meaning: The mind itself is the world, and it should be purified through effort.And that mind, when absorbed in something, appears as the eternal and hidden (secret).
